title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 1 ยง 65.4 - Time limitation of health certificate
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 1 ยง 65.4 - Time limitation of health certificate

State Regulations

The health certificate shall show that the dog or cat was
examined by a veterinarian within 30 days of entry of the dog or cat into the

State of New York. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 1
ยง
65.4

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
